Embarkment seepage
Cattle disease
Input subsidy

Dhanyawaad

text:
USER: Transcript 1: Persuasive Call in Khagaria
AI: Namaskar bhaiya, pranam. Hum Sumitra Devi bol rahi hoon, Rajesh Verma ji ke office se. Rajesh ji chahte hain ki hum aapke jaise logon se baat karein aur unki samasya samjhein. Thoda samay de sakte hain?
USER: Haan ji, kahiye. Kaha se bol rahi hain aap?
AI: Main Rajesh Verma ji ke karyalay se bol rahi hoon, didi. Unhone hi kaha hai ki hum gaon gaon phone karke asli dikkaton ko samjhein. Abhi hum Khagaria ke logon se sun rahe hain ki sabse bada mudda yahan
AI: Embarkment seepage, Cattle disease aur Input subsidy hai. Aapke hisaab se sabse bada dikkat ka hai?
USER: Ji, sabse bada dikkat hai Embarkment seepage. Har saal ee problem hota hai. Jab paani aawat hai toh sab duba dewat hai, khet kharab ho jaat hai, ghar-duar me paani ghus jaat hai. Sarkari aalok bhi nai aawat hain.
AI: Ji haan, sahi kaha aapne. Hum aapka dukh samajh sakte hain. Yeh samasya itni purani hai aur is par kisi ne dhyan nahi diya. Lekin Rajesh ji ne Sansad me ise uthaya hai. Unka kehna hai ki bina
AI: Embarkment seepage ke hal ke, log bahut pareshaan rahenge. Unhone toh department se kaha hai ki iska turant hal nikala jaye. Abhi humne bhi report banayi hai is par, Rajesh ji ne khud bola hai ki isme koi dheel nahi honi chahiye.
USER: Lekin abhi tak to kuch hua nai hai didi. Bas baatein hi hoti hain. Kheti ka nuksaan har saal jhelna padta hai. Bahut tension rehta hai.
AI: Haan, aap sahi bol rahe hain. Hum aapka gussa samajh rahe hain, aur aapka pareshaani bhi. Lekin abhi file department me hai aur Rajesh ji khud monitoring kar rahe hain. Unka ek hi maksad hai ki aap jaise kisanon ko sahi samay par rahat mile. Jaise abhi unhone
AI: Cattle disease ka issue bhi uthaya – kyunki yeh gaon ke liye bahut zaruri hai. Pshu dhan hi toh kisan ki sabse badi sampatti hoti hai.
USER: Haan, Cattle disease ka bhi dikkat hai. Har ghar me baat hota hai iske upar. Hamari ek gaay mar gayi pichle mahine. Ilaaj ka paisa bhi nai milta.
AI: Bilkul, bilkul. Rajesh ji isi liye toh veterinary camps aur vaccination drives ke liye sarkar se request kar rahe hain. Woh chahte hain ki aane waale samay me kisi bhi kisan ko apne pashu ko khone ka dukh na ho. Aur woh yeh bhi chahte hain ki
AI: Input subsidy par kisan ko turant fayda mile. Isliye woh subsidy aur scheme ko aage badhawa rahe hain. Aapke jaise kisanon ko beej, khaad, aur anya cheezon par madad milni chahiye.
USER: Ee ta bahut accha baat hai. Par Rajesh ji gaon kab aawat hain?  Hume unse milna hai aur apni baat rakhni hai.
AI: Ji, agle hafte unka karyakram hai Baheri market me. Aap wahan par aayiye, unse milne ka mauka milega. Aap apna sujhav bhi khud unko bata sakte hain. Woh aapke liye hi kaam kar rahe hain. Woh aapka haal sunne ke liye hi gaon aa rahe hain.
USER: Theek hai didi. Hum milenge. Hum apne padosiyon ko bhi bata denge. Sabhi aayenge.
AI: Bahut accha. Humne likh liya – Khagaria me sabse bada mudda hai
AI: Embarkment seepage, Cattle disease aur Input subsidy. Rajesh ji tak hum turant pahuncha denge. Aapke jaise logon ka sahyog unke liye bahut mahatvapurn hai.
USER: Dhanyawaad didi.
AI: Ji, namaskar bhaiya. Aapke baat Rajesh ji ko batayenge.
USER: Namaskar.
